roleset.name: subtract, take away, count as a debt
roleset.note: DEBIT-V NOTES: Based on sentences in call home. Comparison to deduct.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from debit.01-v)

role.descr: thing being subtracted from, or who must pay

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: But it has to be debited from a bank account

example.name: with arg 0
example.text: Then they debit the owner's credit card

example.name: all args
example.text: they've been debiting them the fare difference
